description: The 37th and current reigning empress of the Abh Empire, she is also Lafiel`s grandmother. She also holds the title "Dreuc Ablïarser" (Countess of Ablïarsec; Ablïarsec is also the name of the stellar system where Lakfakalle (Lacmhacarh), the imperial capital, is located).
name: Abriel Nei Debrusc Spunej Ramaj
